bwwExcerpt: This astonishing musical is part thrilling re-construction and part vivid deconstruction of the process of putting on a 1921 Broadway show that had had a seismic impact on the art form...There is no greater voice in modern musical theatre than McDonald and she lends those rich, glorious tones to both the title song and the original show's break-out hit (I'm Just) Wild About Harry...But the drive and passion of George C Wolfe's utterly gorgeously executed musical is the percussive tap dancing of
